messages.title: 🚀 Available on F-droid !
messages.message:
🎉 Shots Studio is now officially available on F-Droid!

📦 Get it here: https://f-droid.org/en/packages/com.ansah.shots_studio/ (click on learn more button below) 

💬 Have feedback or suggestions? Open a thread in GitHub Issues or Discussions.

Thank you for your support! 
- Team Shots Studio

messages.title: 🚀 What's NEW !
messages.message:
Thanks for all your amazing feedback — we've been listening! v1.8.80 brings powerful updates to supercharge your screenshot workflow:

• 🎨 Custom Themes & AMOLED Mode - Tailor the look to match your vibe.
• 📱 Large Screen Optimization - Seamless support for tablets and foldables.
• 📂 Custom Path Support - Load screenshots from any folder of your choice.

⭐ Like the project? Star the repo!
💬 Have feedback or suggestions? Open an issue or start a discussion — we'll get to it ASAP.
